CodonU.correspondence_analysis.mca_codon_rscu¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

mca_codon_rscu(→ tuple[pandas.DataFrame, numpy.ndarray])

Calculates the contingency table and the inertia from RSCU of every codon of every genes
CodonU.correspondence_analysis.mca_codon_rscu.mca_codon_rscu(handle: str, genetic_table_num: int, min_len_threshold: int = 200, n_components: int = 59) → tuple[pandas.DataFrame, numpy.ndarray]¶

Calculates the contingency table and the inertia from RSCU of every codon of every genes

Parameters:

  • handle – Handle to the file, or the filename as a string

  • genetic_table_num – Genetic table number for codon table

  • min_len_threshold – Minimum length of nucleotide sequence to be considered as gene (optional)

  • n_components – The number of principal components to compute (optional)

Returns:

The contingency table and inertia
